note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Big Lifts
body:
### Features.
* Choose your routine. Doing Starting Strength or 531? It's covered.
* Add and modify lifts.
* Log and track your lifts through cycles.

Wouldn't it be cool to create your own programming and share it with the world? Yeah, I think so too.

### Something missing?
If you think the app can be improved in any way, let me know! I want this to be the best mobile lifting experience, period. E-mail me at biglifts@stefankendall.com for any and all feedback.

![Lift Screen](https://raw.github.com/stefankendall/Big-Lifts/premium/distribution/screenshots/iphone/individual-lift.png)
tagline: Choose your routine. Lift. Get strong.
